title.narrative: Energy Community of South East Europe APL6 Project - Turkey

description.narrative: Increase the reliability and capacity of the power transmission system in Turkey and improve its ability to integrate renewable energy into the system.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Republic of Turkey (Represented by the Undersecretariat of Treasury)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule, Section I. 3. | Description :(a) implement the EMF and LAPF | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule, Section I. 3. | Description :(b) furnish on a semi-annual basis, specific environmental reports andland acquisition reports. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule, Section I. 3. | Description :(c) not modify or waive, in whole or in part, the EMF or LAPF withoutthe prior agreement of the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule, Section V. 1 (a) (ii) | Description :maintain, beginning with the Fiscal Year 2010, a ratio of currentassets to current liabilities of not less than 1.0; and | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule, Section V. 1. (a) (i) | Description :produce, for each of its Fiscal Years, funds from internalsources equivalent to not less than 35% for the Fiscal Year 2010 and in each succeeding FY of the Entity's capital expenditures |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule, Section V. 1. (a) (iii) | Description :the net revenues of the Entity shall be at least 1.5 times in2010 and each succeeding FY, the estimated maximum debt service requirements of the Entity for any such FY on all debt of theEntity. | Frequency :Yearly
